name: random-z
description: random number generator for the unit normal distribution
author: Hugo Villeneuve

scripts.build:browser: rollup -o ./browser.js -f iife -n random-z --banner "/* hugov@runbox.com | https://github.com/hville/random-z.git | license:MIT */" ./module.js
scripts.build: npm run build:main & npm run build:browser
